channel.title: How do I...? Open It To See What I need Help With
channel.description:
First thing: How do I make npc talk overhead?
Second thing: How do I raise stats of Dark_bow so it hits higher. Its not in item.cfg because when you change that it doesn't change hits.
Third thing: How do I raise stats of Karils C Bow and any other crossbow. In item.cfg, i changed the range but it didn't raise max hit.
Fourth thing: How do I put in that highscores bored and it make it worK? Not spoon feeding noobs.
Help me please?

item.title: How do I...? Open It To See What I need Help With
item.dc:creator: @p00n99range p00n99range
item.description:
@p00n99range wrote:

if (UseCrossBow) {
HasBolts = false;
CheckBolts();
//CalculateRange();
hitDiff = misc.random(maxRangeHit());
}

Read full topic
item.source: How do I...? Open It To See What I need Help With

item.title: How do I...? Open It To See What I need Help With

public int maxRangeHit()

Lemme see.

item.title: How do I...? Open It To See What I need Help With
item.dc:creator: @p00n99range p00n99range
item.description:
@p00n99range wrote:

Where do i check the calculaterange() method? What column ? client.java right? Also, i don’t have any other npc that talk over their head.

For Calculaterange() method this is what i found:
Code:

if (UseCrossBow) { //CalculateRange(); hitDiff = misc.random(maxRangeHit()); if (DeleteArrow() && HasBolts) { lastArrow = System.currentTimeMillis(); arrow = true; actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); } else { ResetAttack(); sM("There is no ammo left in your quiver."); return false; } }

Would I just copy and paste that code and replace that item code with the crossbow I want to use range bonuses?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I...? Open It To See What I need Help With

item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Not here to spoon feed some little kid

[/quote]
What does that have to do with this topic?[/quote]

Telenim wants to bang me. Don’t listen.

  1. NPCHandler. I’m sure you have other talking people.

    1. Check your calculateRange() method, as the bonus of the weapon may not matter whatsoever.
